item.title: Small-Group Road to Hana Adventure Tour with Pickup B/F & Lunch
item.description: Hit the world-famous road to Hana during the full-day sightseeing tour of this byway’s lush farms, scenic overlooks, and rich Hawaiian history. Try to keep your jaw from dropping as you proceed along this iconic north-Maui route, passing postcard-perfect scenery at Wai'anapanapa State Park, Ho’okipa Beach Park, and Waikani Falls. Continue on to Ke’anae, a historic Hawaiian hamlet known for its fisherman and photo-worthy atmosphere, and see the final resting place of aviator Charles Lindbergh. A guide, round-trip hotel transport, and lunch are all included.

image.alt: Small-Group Road to Hana Adventure Tour with Pickup B/F & Lunch

item.title: Famous Road to Hana Waterfalls and Lunch by Mercedes Van
item.description: The Hana Highway weaves along the northeast coast of Maui, and it’s well known on the island for the postcard-perfect waterfalls that punctuate it. Spend your day exploring these dramatic natural highlights and swimming in their pools on this fully-chauffeured tour. Instead of hiring your own expensive rental car and trying to drive this winding and unfamiliar road yourself, navigate the winding scenic roads of the Hana Highway with your guide at the wheel.

image.alt: Famous Road to Hana Waterfalls and Lunch by Mercedes Van

item.title: Road to Hana: Full-Day Scenic Drive with Blacksand & Waterfalls
item.description: Take an epic journey along the stretch of picturesque roadway known as the Road to Hāna on this full-day tour that highlights the best of Hawaii's natural beauty and stunning landscapes. See beautiful beaches, quiet coastline, and towering waterfalls as you make your way across the Kalepa Bridge, where the highway continues to Kīpahulu on the Piilani Highway. This journey through the iconic narrow highway is comprised of 59 bridges and more than 600 curves taking travelers in and out of rain forest and tropical foliage.

image.alt: Road to Hana: Full-Day Scenic Drive with Blacksand & Waterfalls

item.title: Small-Group Road to Hana Luxury Tour
item.description: Discover the incredible landscape and hidden sightseeing gems along the road to Hana during this small-group sightseeing excursion. This iconic Maui roadway offers plenty of twists and turns, plus an amazing wealth of attractions and activities. Stop for pictures above the towering lava cliffs, explore a tropical garden, swim in the crystal-clear pool below a waterfall, and dig into a picnic or an optional Pacific-Rim style lunch. A guide, breakfast, chilled drinks entrance fees, and round-trip hotel transport are included.

image.alt: Small-Group Road to Hana Luxury Tour

item.title: Rainforest Tour to Hana and Beyond
item.description: Visit some of Maui's most stunning natural locations during this full-day small-group tour. Join a family-operated, native Hawaiin tour company, with lunch, bottled water, and air-conditioned vehicle transfers provided. Highlights include rainbow bark eucalyptus trees in Huelo, panoramic views from Keanae peninsula, glimpses of Haleakala volcano, and optional swimming stops in Pua'a Ka'a and Wai'anapanapa state parks.

image.alt: Rainforest Tour to Hana and Beyond

item.title: Road to Hana Tour with Lunch and Pickup
item.description: The Hana Highway is one of the country’s most beautiful driving routes—and this full-day, small-group tour makes it simple to wend your way down the road, as well as visit other highlights of the region. Following morning pickup at your Maui hotel, travel in an air-conditioned vehicle and stop for a local breakfast. Then, continue on your way. You’ll drive the Hana Highway, to discover Wai'anapanapa State Park’s black-sand beach, Pua'a Ka'a for a waterfall swim, and a picnic lunch at a local flower farm.

image.alt: Road to Hana Tour with Lunch and Pickup

item.title: Majestic Haleakala Sunrise Tour with Pick-up
item.description: Seeing the sunrise from the top of Haleakala Mountain is one of Maui’s most coveted travel experiences—and this tour takes all the hassle out of experiencing the natural show for yourself. Following nighttime pickup from your area hotel, make your way to Haleakala National Park. Then, ride to the summit. You should arrive in time to admire the sunrise. Afterward, tour other highlights of the national park before a hearty buffet meal.

image.alt: Majestic Haleakala Sunrise Tour with Pick-up

item.title: Waterfall & Rainforest Hiking Adventure with Hotel Pickup
item.description: On this guided East Maui rainforest hike, experience the hidden, tropical beauty of the island’s lush interior. Here in one of the island’s most popular valleys, your guide will take you to sections of the rainforest that are well off the beaten track, where secret waterfalls spill into pools that welcome you for a dip. Adventurous visitors can climb up the rocks and jump towards the pools below, or simply relax in the jungle scenery while enjoying a refreshing lunch. This Maui waterfalls and rainforest hike is a total of 5-6 hours, and transport from your Maui hotel can also be arranged.

image.alt: Waterfall & Rainforest Hiking Adventure with Hotel Pickup

item.title: Road To Hana: Maui Waterfall Hiking Tour in Private Jeep
item.description: Discover the many waterfalls along the Road to Hana with a private guide to show you the best photo spots and vistas. While group tours spend more time driving, this personalized tour is focused on the adventures along the way. An ideal excursion for families, seniors, or couples, your flexible guide lets you set the pace rather than being forced to keep up with—or wait for—other tourists.

image.alt: Road To Hana: Maui Waterfall Hiking Tour in Private Jeep

item.title: Road to Hana in Mercedes Van: Waterfalls and Black Sand Beach
item.description: Discover the best of Maui on a Road to Hana road trip alongside a small group. Climb aboard your Mercedes van and stop at several points of interest including black sand beaches, refreshing waterfalls, and old lava flows. Your tour is also inclusive of a delicious homemade breakfast as well as a catered lunch in the beautiful Wainapanapa State Park.

image.alt: Road to Hana in Mercedes Van: Waterfalls and Black Sand Beach

item.title: Road to Hana Adventure in Maui - Private - Just for Your Group
item.description: Take a ride along the famous Road to Hana and discover the beauty of Maui during this exciting excursion. Alongside a private guide, create an itinerary based on the interests of your group or follow a pre-set journey. The road covers everything from small towns to beaches and waterfalls to rain forests and volcanoes. Get a deeper understanding of Maui as you listen to commentary about its history and culture.

image.alt: Road to Hana Adventure in Maui - Private - Just for Your Group

item.title: Haleakala Classic Vehicle Sunrise Tour with Breakfast
item.description: See sunrise from the top of Maui’s highest volcano during this informative tour of Haleakala National Park. Climb aboard an air-conditioned vehicle for a scenic tour of the dormant volcano and crater of Haleakala and the upcountry area. Learn about the culture, history, and geology of Maui during the trip. After sunrise, visit the historic towns of Makawao and breakfast in Pa’ia.

image.alt: Haleakala Classic Vehicle Sunrise Tour with Breakfast

item.title: Maui Shore Excursion : Road to Hana Day Trip P/up Ka'anapali
item.description: Maui's Road to Hana is one of the most famous highways in the United States. Embark on a full-day tour of the coastal drive on a small-group tour from Lahaina. This road trip features several points of interest and your guide takes you to the best ones including Pua'a Ka'a State Park, Wailua Falls, and Wai'anapanapa State Park. Spend your day immersed in the lush landscapes of Maui.

image.alt: Maui Shore Excursion : Road to Hana Day Trip P/up Ka'anapali

item.title: Road to Hana Deluxe Rainforest and Waterfall Experience from Maui
item.description: Book this Hana Highway (Road to Hana) Rainforest and Waterfall Tour from Kaanapali and avoid the stress of navigating the 21A highway in Hawaii. This tour takes care of the main details like driving, lunch, and select attraction entry fees, so you can enjoy the beauty that is Hawaii. Some stops include Ke‘anae Point, Ho'okipa Beach Park, Pua'a Ka'a State Wayside, and Wai'anapanapa State Park.

image.alt: Road to Hana Deluxe Rainforest and Waterfall Experience from Maui

item.title: Small-Group Luxury Tour: Road to Hana and Ka'eleku Cavern Day Trip
item.description: Make the trip along the famous Road to Hana in style during this 10-hour sightseeing day trip by luxurious Limo-Van, including a stop to explore Ka’eleku Cavern. Enjoy unparalleled views of the Pacific coast and the beautiful rainforests as you drive this incredible road. Then check out the unique subterranean interior of Ka’eleku Cavern and its ancient lava formations. Stop for an upscale lunch before reaching Hana to experience its beautiful tropical nursery garden and waterfall pools, cooling off with an invigorating dip. Your trip includes a light breakfast, snacks, round-trip hotel transport and a guide.

image.alt: Small-Group Luxury Tour: Road to Hana and Ka'eleku Cavern Day Trip

item.title: Road to Hana Deluxe Rainforest & Waterfall Experience Maui
item.description: This Hana Highway Rainforest and Waterfall Tour from Lahaina packs in a full day of exploring the Road to Hana without making you plan your way to get around. Ride the highway with a guide who knows the best stops to make along the way, including Waianapanapa State Park. Learn about Hawaiian culture and the state’s history from your guide as you take in beautiful views of waterfalls and rainforests, too.

image.alt: Road to Hana Deluxe Rainforest & Waterfall Experience Maui

item.title: Maui Nui Luau at the Sheraton Maui Resort & Spa
item.description: At this oceanfront, Kaanapali luau on the island of Maui, feel the rhythmic beat of the drums as the sun sinks low in the sky, and experience the magic of Polynesian dance as tiki torches flicker in the night. Here at one of Maui’s best luaus, smell the fragrant tropical lei you’re given upon arrival. This Kaanapali sunset luau is full of exotic dances, as well as a filling, flavorful all-you-can-eat buffet featuring traditional Hawaiian cooking.

image.alt: Maui Nui Luau at the Sheraton Maui Resort & Spa

item.title: Departure Shuttle: Hotels&Private Residences to Kahului Airport(OGG)-Maui Island
item.description: Get from your hotel in Maui to your departure flight with ease aboard this shared shuttle service. Your shuttle picks you up right from your hotel, resort, or private residence in the Kahului, Kihei, Wailea, Makena, Lahaina, or Kaanapali areas. Then, sit back and relax on the journey to Kahului Airport (OGG), arriving with plenty of time before your departure flight.

image.alt: Departure Shuttle: Hotels&Private Residences to Kahului Airport(OGG)-Maui Island

item.title: Shared Departure Transfer: Hotel to Maui Kahului Airport
item.description: Complete your relaxing time in paradise with a shared transfer to the Maui International Airport from your Maui hotel in Kihei/Wailea, Kaanapali/Lahaina, Kahana/Honokowai or Kapalua/Napili. A friendly driver will pick you up directly at your hotel and lead you to an air-conditioned shuttle, where you can throw in your luggage, sit back and travel to the airport comfortably. Please note that you must select a hotel that coincides with the areas listed in the Itinerary section below.

image.alt: Shared Departure Transfer: Hotel to Maui Kahului Airport

item.title: Maui Tour : Road to Hana Day Trip from Lahaina with Pick-up
item.description: Embark on one of the most famous road trips in the US, the Road to Hana, on this full-day excursion from Lahaina. Join a small group and drive along the scenic route filled with over 600 turns and hairpin curves. Stop at several points of interest including waterfalls, viewpoints, and beaches as well as a stop at a local spot for lunch.

image.alt: Maui Tour : Road to Hana Day Trip from Lahaina with Pick-up

item.title: Round-Trip Airport Shuttle Kahului Airport on Maui
item.description: Easily get from Kahului Airport (OGG) to your accommodation in Maui with this pre-booked shuttle service. Meet your driver at baggage claim and head to your shared shuttle with the other passengers. You are then dropped off at your hotel, resort, or residence in Lahaina, Kahului, Kapalua, or Kihei. When your vacation is over, you are picked up from your resort and taken back to the airport.

image.alt: Round-Trip Airport Shuttle Kahului Airport on Maui

item.title: Myths of Maui Luau Dinner and Show
item.description: Live drumming, traditional dances, and fire-knife performances create a thrilling luau dinner show centered on traditional Hawaiian culture. A beachfront sunset and dinner buffet (with special kids' options available) makes for an unforgettable evening. Book a general admission ticket for dinner and a show, or opt for the VIP choice to guarantee priority buffet access and front section seating.

image.alt: Myths of Maui Luau Dinner and Show

item.title: Famous Road to Hana Waterfalls, Black Sand Beach & Lunch
item.description: Discover Maui's iconic Road to Hana route when you book this small-group, luxury tour. An expert driver navigates all the driving and chooses the perfect spot for a lavish lunch (included) so you can focus on the breathtaking landscapes and untouched beauty of this mesmerizing route. Led by a knowledgeable guide, immerse yourself in historic tales and legendary stories that have shaped the islands.

image.alt: Famous Road to Hana Waterfalls, Black Sand Beach & Lunch

item.title: Classic Haleakala Sunrise Tour
item.description: Get up for the sunrise on this group tour to Haleakala. You’ll be conveniently collected from your hotel, and then you’ll drive with your group to Haleakala National Park. Climb to the volcano’s summit and watch the sunrise. Along the tour you’ll stop at several more places and hear about the geology and nature from your certified guide. You’ll have breakfast provided for you, too.

image.alt: Classic Haleakala Sunrise Tour
